package DACASSI;
import java.util.*;
	
public class Prec {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.print("number");
		int a=s.nextInt();
		if (a%2==0) 
		if( a>2 && a<5);
		{
			System.out.println("not wired");
		}
		 if(a>6 && a<20);
			{
				System.out.print("werid");
			}
			 if(a>20)
				 {
					System.out.print(" not werid");
				 }
	
		

	}

}
